title: Authors and Citation

code: @Manual{,   title = {congress: Access the Congress.gov API},   author = {Christopher T. Kenny},   year = {2023},   note = {R package version 0.0.3,  http://christophertkenny.com/congress/},   url = {https://github.com/christopherkenny/congress}, }

title: Access the Congress.gov API
text: congress provides mostly tidy interface Congress.gov API, available https://github.com/LibraryOfCongress/api.congress.gov/. provides simple R interface downloading working actions, bills, nominations, Congress.

title: Access the Congress.gov API
text: can install development version congress GitHub :
code: # install.packages("devtools") devtools::install_github("christopherkenny/congress")

title: Access the Congress.gov API
text: get recent nominations, can use cong_nomination() function. default, gets recent 20. request , recent 10.
code: library(congress)  cong_nomination(limit = 10) #> # A tibble: 10 × 13 #>    citation congress description  lates…¹ lates…² nomin…³ nomin…⁴ nomin…⁵ number #>    <chr>    <chr>    <chr>        <chr>   <chr>   <chr>   <chr>   <chr>   <chr>  #>  1 PN2678   117      " "          2022-0… Receiv… FALSE   TRUE    "U.S. … 2678   #>  2 PN2673   117      " "          2022-0… Receiv… FALSE   TRUE    "U.S. … 2673   #>  3 PN2675   117      " "          2022-0… Receiv… FALSE   TRUE    "U.S. … 2675   #>  4 PN2677   117      " "          2022-0… Receiv… FALSE   TRUE    "U.S. … 2677   #>  5 PN2676   117      " "          2022-0… Receiv… FALSE   TRUE    "U.S. … 2676   #>  6 PN2674   117      " "          2022-0… Receiv… FALSE   TRUE    "U.S. … 2674   #>  7 PN2672   117      "Ronald T. … 2022-0… Receiv… TRUE    FALSE   "Gover… 2672   #>  8 PN2670   117      "Todd E. Ed… 2022-0… Receiv… TRUE    FALSE   "Gover… 2670   #>  9 PN2666   117      "Travis Hil… 2022-0… Receiv… TRUE    FALSE   "Gover… 2666   #> 10 PN2669   117      " "          2022-0… Receiv… FALSE   TRUE    "U.S. … 2669   #> # … with 4 more variables: part_number <chr>, received_date <chr>, #> #   update_date <chr>, url <chr>, and abbreviated variable names #> #   ¹​latest_action_action_date, ²​latest_action_text, #> #   ³​nomination_type_is_civilian, ⁴​nomination_type_is_military, #> #   ⁵​nomination_type_name

title: Access the Congress.gov API
text: package designed v3 Congress.gov API. currently supports following endpoints: bill cong_bill() amendments cong_amendment() summaries cong_summaries() congress cong_congress() member cong_member() committee cong_committee() committee report cong_committee_report() Congressional Record cong_record() House communication cong_communication() nomination cong_nomination() treaty cong_treaty()

title: Request Amendment Information — cong_amendment
code: cong_amendment(   congress = NULL,   type = NULL,   number = NULL,   item = NULL,   from_date = NULL,   to_date = NULL,   limit = 20,   offset = 0,   format = "json",   clean = TRUE )

title: Request Amendment Information — cong_amendment
text: congress Congress number search . 81 later supported. type Type amendment. Can 'hamdt', 'samdt', 'suamdt'. number Amendment assigned number. Numeric. item Information request. Can 'actions', 'amendments', 'cosponsors' from_date start date search, e.g. '2022-04-01'. Defaults recent. to_date end date search, e.g. '2022-04-03'. Defaults recent. limit number records return. Default 20. truncated 1 250. offset number records skip. Default 0. Must non-negative. format Output format clean = FALSE. One xml json. clean Default TRUE. output returned tibble (TRUE) requested format.

title: Request Amendment Information — cong_amendment
code: if (FALSE) { # congress::has_congress_key() # Requires API Key  cong_amendment()  cong_amendment(congress = 117)  cong_amendment(congress = 117, type = 'samdt', number = 2137)  cong_amendment(congress = 117, type = 'samdt', number = 2137, item = 'actions')  }

title: Request Bill Information — cong_bill
code: cong_bill(   congress = NULL,   type = NULL,   number = NULL,   item = NULL,   from_date = NULL,   to_date = NULL,   limit = 20,   offset = 0,   format = "json",   clean = TRUE )

title: Request Bill Information — cong_bill
text: congress Congress number search . 81 later supported. type Type bill. Can 'hr', 's', 'hjres', 'sjres', 'hconres', 'sconres', 'hres', 'sres'. number Bill assigned number. Numeric. item Information request. Can 'actions', 'amendments', 'committees', 'cosponsors', 'relatedbills', 'subjects', 'text', 'titles' from_date start date search, e.g. '2022-04-01'. Defaults recent. to_date end date search, e.g. '2022-04-03'. Defaults recent. limit number records return. Default 20. truncated 1 250. offset number records skip. Default 0. Must non-negative. format Output format clean = FALSE. One xml json. clean Default TRUE. output returned tibble (TRUE) requested format.

title: Request Bill Information — cong_bill
code: if (FALSE) { # congress::has_congress_key() # Requires API Key  cong_bill()  cong_bill(congress = 117)  cong_bill(congress = 117, type = 'hr', number = 3076)  cong_bill(congress = 117, type = 'hr', number = 3076, item = 'actions') }

title: Request Committee Information — cong_committee
code: cong_committee(   congress = NULL,   chamber = NULL,   committee = NULL,   item = NULL,   from_date = NULL,   to_date = NULL,   limit = 20,   offset = 0,   format = "json",   clean = TRUE )

title: Request Committee Information — cong_committee
text: congress Congress number search . 81 later supported. chamber Chamber name. Can 'house', 'senate', 'joint'. committee Code identifying committee. Character. item Information request. Can 'bills', 'reports', 'nominations', 'house-communication', 'senate-communication'. from_date start date search, e.g. '2022-04-01'. Defaults recent. to_date end date search, e.g. '2022-04-03'. Defaults recent. limit number records return. Default 20. truncated 1 250. offset number records skip. Default 0. Must non-negative. format Output format clean = FALSE. One xml json. clean Default TRUE. output returned tibble (TRUE) requested format.

title: Request Committee Information — cong_committee
code: if (FALSE) { # congress::has_congress_key() # Requires API Key  cong_committee()  cong_committee(congress = 117)  cong_committee(chamber = 'house')  cong_committee(congress = 117, chamber = 'house')  cong_committee(chamber = 'house', committee = 'hsed10')  cong_committee(chamber = 'house', committee = 'hspw00', item = 'house-communication')  cong_committee(chamber = 'senate', committee = 'jsec03')  cong_committee(chamber = 'senate', committee = 'slpo00', item = 'bills')  cong_committee(chamber = 'senate', committee = 'slpo00', item = 'senate-communication') }

text: congress Congress number search . 81 later supported. chamber Chamber name. Can 'house', 'senate', 'nochamber'. number Meeting event identifier. Character (numeric). from_date start date search, e.g. '2022-04-01'. Defaults recent. to_date end date search, e.g. '2022-04-03'. Defaults recent. limit number records return. Default 20. truncated 1 250. offset number records skip. Default 0. Must non-negative. format Output format clean = FALSE. One xml json. clean Default TRUE. output returned tibble (TRUE) requested format.

title: Request Committee Print Information — cong_committee_print
text: congress Congress number search . 81 later supported. chamber Chamber name. Can 'house', 'senate', 'nochamber'. number Jacket number print. Character (numeric). item Information request. Can  'text'. from_date start date search, e.g. '2022-04-01'. Defaults recent. to_date end date search, e.g. '2022-04-03'. Defaults recent. limit number records return. Default 20. truncated 1 250. offset number records skip. Default 0. Must non-negative. format Output format clean = FALSE. One xml json. clean Default TRUE. output returned tibble (TRUE) requested format.

title: Request Committee Report Information — cong_committee_report
text: congress Congress number search . 81 later supported. type Type committee report. Can 'hrpt', 'srpt', 'erpt'. number Committee report assigned number. Numeric. item Information request. Can  'text'. conference Filter conference reports. Default FALSE. limit number records return. Default 20. truncated 1 250. offset number records skip. Default 0. Must non-negative. format Output format clean = FALSE. One xml json. clean Default TRUE. output returned tibble clean = TRUE requested format.

title: Request Committee Report Information — cong_committee_report
code: if (FALSE) { # congress::has_congress_key()  # Requires API Key  cong_committee_report()  cong_committee_report(conference = TRUE)  cong_committee_report(congress = 116)  cong_committee_report(congress = 116, type = 'hrpt')  cong_committee_report(congress = 116, type = 'hrpt', number = 617)  cong_committee_report(congress = 116, type = 'hrpt', number = 617, item = 'text') }

what: Check or Get Congress API Key — key
title: Check or Get Congress API Key — key
Check or Get Congress API Key — key
code: has_congress_key()  get_congress_key()

title: Check or Get Congress API Key — key
Check or Get Congress API Key — key
code: has_congress_key() #> [1] FALSE

title: Add Entry to Renviron — set_congress_key
code: set_congress_key(key, overwrite = FALSE, install = FALSE)

title: Add Entry to Renviron — set_congress_key
text: key Character. API key add add. overwrite Defaults FALSE. Boolean. existing CONGRESS_KEY Renviron overwritten? install Defaults FALSE. Boolean. added '~/.Renviron' file?

title: Add Entry to Renviron — set_congress_key
code: if (FALSE) { set_congress_key('1234') }

title: congress 0.0.3
text: Resolves bug cong_senate_communication() providing number return empty tibble. Resolves bug cong_member() rows duplicated bioguide provided. Addresses changes June 2023 API changes (#10) changes necessary within congress package. changes upstream automatically handled. Addresses changes May 2023 API changes (#9) Supports new item endpoint within cong_house_requirement() Renames (internal) cong_house_communication() endpoint number provided. due upstream change house-communication houseCommunication. Addresses changes March 2023 API changes (#7) Adds cong_hearing() access new hearing API endpoint. Adds cong_committee_meeting() access new committee-meeting API endpoint. Adds cong_committee_print() access new committee-print API endpoint.

title: congress 0.0.2
text: Resolves bug cong_bill() item = 'text' return empty tibble. Addresses changes February 2023 API changes (#6) Allows house-communication senate-communication items cong_committee(). Passes format cong_senate_communication() returned data committees list-column. Additional bug fixes upstream API, may slightly modify columns cong_member(), cong_committee(), cong_amendment(). changes automatically handled version 0.0.1 since February 2023. Addresses changes January 2023 API changes (#4) (#5) Upstream API changes allow full coverage MCs cong_member(). Upstream API changes let cong_bill() include CBO estimates. changes automatically handled version 0.0.1 since January 2023. Addresses changes December 2022 API changes (#3). Adds cong_house_requirement() access new house-requirement API endpoint. Addresses changes November 2022 API changes (#1) (#2). cong_communication() deprecated favor cong_house_communication(), new senate endpoint added. can accessed via cong_senate_communication(). Returned columns slightly modified cong_nomination(), cong_committee_report(), cong_nomination(). changes automatically handled version 0.0.1 since November 2022.

title: congress 0.0.1
text: CRAN release: 2022-10-12 Added NEWS.md file track changes package. Initial release, functional API beta version endpoints.
